name: tm63
effect: Teaches Embargo to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Embargo to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
It prevents the foe from using its
held item. Its Trainer is also
prevented from using items on it.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
It prevents the foe from using its
held item. Its Trainer is also
prevented from using items on it.

It prevents the foe from using its
held item. Its Trainer is also
prevented from using items on it.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
It prevents the target from using its
held item. Its Trainer is also prevented
from using items on it.

It prevents the target from using its

This move prevents the target from
using its held item. Its Trainer is

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:

item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented
from using items on it.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.
